thread.title: InventHelp Inventor Develops Bicycle Accessory for Exercise Purposes (LGI-2009)
thread.title_full: InventHelp Inventor Develops Bicycle Accessory for Exercise Purposes (LGI-2009) - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: InventHelp Inventor Develops Bicycle Accessory for Exercise Purposes (LGI-2009)
text:
Pittsburgh-based InventHelp is working to submit this idea, BIKE FUN, to companies for their consideration and potential feedback.
PITTSBURGH, PA (PRWEB) October 22, 2015
"I want to keep my 3-1/2-year-old daughter interested in her own health, fitness and well-being all her life," said an inventor from South Hampton, N.Y. "To this end, I came up with a way to encourage her to ride her bicycle while she watches TV at home."
He developed the BIKE FUN to turn any bicycle into a stationary bicycle. This enables the user to ride a bicycle for exercise indoors, which ensures that you can work out, even during inclement weather. The unit promotes health and physical activity. In addition, it can be used by children for imaginative play and exercise.
The original design was submitted to the Long Island office of InventHelp. It is currently available for licensing or sale to manufacturers or marketers. For more information, write Dept. 14-LGI-2009, InventHelp, 217 Ninth Street, Pittsburgh, PA 15222, or call (412) 288-1300 ext. 1368. Learn more about InventHelp's Invention Submission Services at http://www.InventHelp.com - https://www.youtube.com/user/inventhelp
